content: पोतः [पू-तन्; <ls>Uṇ. 3. 86</ls>] {@--1@} The young of any animal, cub, colt, foal &c.; पिब स्तन्यं पोत <ls>Bv. 1. 60</ls>; मृगपोतः, शार्दूल° <ls>Mu. 2. 8</ls>; करिपोतः &c.; वीरपोतः a young warrior; <ls>U. 5. 3.</ls> {@--2@} An elephant ten years old. {@--3@} A ship, raft, boat; पोतो दुस्तरवारिराशितरणे <ls>H. 2. 165.</ls> {@--4@} A garment, cloth. {@--5@} The young shoot of a plant. {@--6@} The site or foundation of a house. {@--7@} A fœtus having no enveloping membrane.
